Article.ArticleTitle: Building public trust in preparation for future health shocks: a research agenda.

Abstract.AbstractText: Trust is fundamental to cooperation, essential in times of crisis. Researching and understanding trust networks and perceptions of trustworthiness is therefore crucial in preparing for future health shocks, write Heidi Larson and colleagues
